attributes.name: Title
attributes.value: Fiji 3Dprojections of Z-stacks of confocal fluorescence microscopy to assess the cellular localisation of EGFP-ABRAXAS1 wild-type/mutant and EGFP-CDC45 wild-type/mutant

attributes.name: Description
attributes.value: Fiji 3Dprojections of Z-stacks recorded on a LSM700 confocal microscopy (Zeiss) represented in Figure 5H and I and Appendix Figure 8-11, Kliche et al., (2024). DAPI was visualised with the 405 nm laser and GFP with the 488 nm laser.

attributes.name: Acknowledgements
attributes.value: We thank Prof. Robert Winqvist for the FLAG-ABRAXAS1 wild-type and mutant constructs.

attributes.name: Funding statement
attributes.value: This work was supported by the grants from the Swedish Research Council (YI: 2020-03380 a Marie Sklodowska-Curie European Training Network Grant #860517 (Ubimotif). Work at the Novo Nordisk Foundation Center for Protein Research is supported by grant NNF14CC0001 and NNF23OC0082227.

attributes.name: Agency
attributes.value: Marie Sklodowska-Curie European Training Network Grant "UbiMotif"

attributes.name: Title
attributes.value: Fixed HEK293 cells transfected with EGFP-constructs (ABRAXAS1 and R361Q mutant; CDC45 wild-type and R157C mutant)

attributes.name: Sample preparation protocol
attributes.value: From bioRxiv 2023.09.18.558189: HEK293 cells were transfected with 0.25 Âµg of respective plasmid (EGFP-ABRAXAS1 and R361Q mutant; EGFP-CDC45 wild-type and R157C mutant) while seeding (ca. 25% confluency) in a 8 chamber slide system (Nunc Lab-Tek II CC2). Medium was changed after 24 h and protein expression allowed for 48 h in total after transfection. After that, cells were fixed and mounted with cell nuclei stained with NucBlue Live ReadyProbes (Invitrogen). Z-stacks of the cells were recorded on a LSM700 confocal microscope (Zeiss) and images analysed with Fiji.

attributes.name: Image acquisition parameters
attributes.value: Z-stacks were recorded using the 63x/1.4 oil objective, 405 nm and 488 nm laser

attributes.name: Image analysis overview
attributes.value: Z-stacks were analysed in Fiji as 3D projections. No quantification of the images was performed.
